name: Cong Ge Bu Lin Dao Ge Bu Lin Shen
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: Lin Tian reincarnated as a goblin, the lowest rank of magical creatures, and initially, he had to lie low. Later, he fully unleashed the true nature of a goblin. Blessed with many offspring, the more children he has, the stronger he becomes thanks to the blessings from the gods!Original Webtoon
